description: This is a configuration file for Vite, a build tool, specifically configuring a React project. It sets up server options, plugin integrations, watch behavior, and adds a custom '/healthz' route for health checks.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines a Vite configuration object to be used internally by Vite as configured in this file.

methods.name: configureServer
methods.description: A hook function that adds middleware to handle the /healthz route, returning 200 OK for health checks.
